name: Into The Depths Alpha build 1.3.2
description:
Into The depths

The story starts with a lone technomancer... wait... what is a Technomancer you ask?


THE STORY STARTS WITH A LONE TECHNOMANCER! who's first time astral projecting into CyberSpace is met with rough start. They're first encounter is with the strongest, most ruthless  AI to ever wake the cyber realm. Dues! Dues spares them though. But not without reason. This poor soul is destined, in the name of Dues, to fight off CyberDemons and bring cyberspace back to a safe realm.


Version Updates

If you've followed the progression and journey of this game I want to say two things. Thank you so much. And I'm so sorry. MAN has it been a journey. Three different versions in the span of 4 years. This version is it though, I swear! The structure of the project has been reworked to scale properly and allow for so many new things! 

So what are these new things?

First, there's a new boss (yes it has replaced the first boss. Will I add the original back in? maybe. I did like the mechanics and want to rework it in.) but there's a whole new list of enemies added! In fact I've completely reworked level progression (still to only level 15, we will get past this progression one of these days!) 

Second is a shop rework. The multiple shop idea has been scrapped and there's only one shop. When you go into it you'll see some new buttons, specifically range. This was something a lot of people wanted. But it took an entire rewrite of enemies and how they function. I can now say there is a proper parent function for enemies!

Future Updates

The next thing that needs done is more bosses. so. many. more. bosses.

After that? I want to develop the powers you gain. I want a better progression of power ramp and how you feel playing the game. So at some point you're going to get a laser. 

Please let me know what you think. I can't read minds (yet). I created this game because I wanted to play this kind of game. If my project can be that for other people then I want to facilitate that.
